full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL BA 'KHYER BDE BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @023A *, ,(CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING LA TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I PHYIR BDE BA 'DI NI, JANG JONG CHEN PO WANG GI MNGA' 'BANGS TSUL KHRIMS RNAM DAG MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA MYUNG GNAS PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SHES RAB DANG, GSO TZIS KYI BLO RIG DANG LDAN PA DEM CHE BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG DANG, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SANGS RGYAS RNAMS NAN TAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGO BSRUNG BA'I PHYIR, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA MTSAN @023B GZHAN BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA THA SHAL PA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING DANG CHOS SKYONG GZHAN LA 'BUL BA'I CHO GA MI MTHONG SHING, BLA MA YI DAM RNAMS KYI TSOGS MCHOD RNAMS YID SHES KYI 'GRE NAS BRIS PA'I 'DI LHAG CHAD MA DAG PA DANG TSUL MIN PA'I NYES SKYONG GZHAN LA THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA TSOGS DANG KHYAD PAR LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA BZOD PAR GSOL SGRIB PAR MI 'GYUR BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DES BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI DAM TSIG NYAMS CHAGS SDIG GRIB RNAMS BYANG ZHING DAG PAS, BSTAN 'GRO'I PHAN DON DU MCHOG MTHUN GYI DNGOS GRUB THOB PA'I RGYU RU SNGO,, ,,)
